name: Lyfe Communications
description: services provider of Internet protocol t
overview: LYFE Communications, Inc., through its wholly owned subsidiary, Connected Lyfe, Inc., operates as an application services provider of Internet protocol television (IPTV), Internet services, and voice over Internet protocol (VOIP) telephone services in Utah. It engages in developing, deploying, and operating the media and communications network platform for the delivery of communications and entertainment services through smart phones, televisions, and portable electronic devices with Internet connectivity in single-family, multi-family, high-rise, resort, and hospitality properties. The companyâ€™s principal products include IPTV, broadband Internet access, and VOIP telephony. It operates on the Utah Telecommunications Open Infrastructure Agency (UTOPIA) fiber network, as well as has approximately 450 subscribers. LYFE Communications, Inc. is based in South Jordan, Utah.

milestones.description: Lyfe Communications Completes Agreement to Acquire Television Broadcast Rights
